Package edu.ncsu.csc316.social.manager

Class SocialMediaManager

java.lang.Object
edu.ncsu.csc316.social.manager.SocialMediaManager
public class SocialMediaManager extends Object
SocialMediaManager accepts input files of lists of people and the connections between them, and is then able to output a list of the connections sorted by person or sorted by platform. The people/platform are sorted alphabetically, while the connections are sorted by either the other username in the connection, or date. SocialMediaManager also has a getPeople method that returns a map of username mapped to the Person.
Author:
Arnold Elamthuruthil

  • Constructor Details

    • SocialMediaManager

      public SocialMediaManager(String peopleFile, String connectionFile) throws FileNotFoundException
      Creates a SocialMediaManager with the default map type, SkipList.
      Parameters:
      peopleFile - input people text file
      connectionFile - input connections text file
      Throws:
      FileNotFoundException - if file is not found

    • SocialMediaManager

      public SocialMediaManager(String peopleFile, String connectionFile, edu.ncsu.csc316.social.dsa.DataStructure mapType) throws FileNotFoundException
      Creates a SocialMediaManager and sets the list type, comparison sorter type, nonComparison Sorter type, and map type. It creates a list of all connections and people found in the input files. A map that maps username to Person object is also created.
      Parameters:
      peopleFile - input people text file
      connectionFile - input connections text file
      mapType - type of map to implement
      Throws:
      FileNotFoundException - if file is not found

  • Method Details

    • getPeople

      public edu.ncsu.csc316.dsa.map.Map<String,edu.ncsu.csc316.social.data.Person> getPeople()
      Retrieves a map with the usernames of the people as keys and the Person with the username as the value
      Returns:
      map of username and Person object

    • getConnectionsByPerson

      public edu.ncsu.csc316.dsa.map.Map<String,edu.ncsu.csc316.dsa.list.List<edu.ncsu.csc316.social.data.Connection>> getConnectionsByPerson()
      Returns a map with the usernames of the people as keys and the list of their connections as the values. The people are sorted alphabetically by last, then first name. The lists of connections are sorted by the second name, then id, then date.
      Returns:
      map of usernames and list of connections for the usernames

    • getConnectionsByPlatform

      public edu.ncsu.csc316.dsa.map.Map<String,edu.ncsu.csc316.dsa.list.List<edu.ncsu.csc316.social.data.Connection>> getConnectionsByPlatform()
      Returns a map with the platforms the connections are made on as keys and the list of their connections as the values. The platforms are sorted alphabetically, and their connections are sorted by date, then id.
      Returns:
      map of platforms and list of connections for the platforms
